name: ar-speaker-position-helper
description: A mobile web app that uses AR to help position speakers and listeners for optimal audio experience

scripts.build: echo 'Building for production...' && npm run lint && npm run validate && npm run minify
scripts.lint: echo 'Linting JavaScript files...' && npx jshint src/**/*.js || true
scripts.validate: echo 'Validating manifest...' && npx web-app-manifest-validator manifest.json || true
scripts.minify: echo 'Minifying assets...' && npx terser src/app.js -o src/app.min.js --compress --mangle || true
scripts.test:lighthouse: echo 'Running Lighthouse audit...' && npx lighthouse http://localhost:8080 --output=html --output-path=./lighthouse-report.html --chrome-flags='--headless' || true
scripts.pwa:analyze: npx pwa-asset-generator icon-source.svg icons --manifest manifest.json --index index.html
